dcterms:creator: Ilya Chugunov
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 20,100 point clouds recorded from two depth cameras capturing ten different static hand gestures, aimed at improving gesture recognition by alleviating occlusion issues.
dcterms:title: DUODEPTH

dcterms:creator: Chaoyu Liang
Yonghong Song
Yuanlin Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset used for comparison in gesture recognition experiments, focusing on hand gesture recognition through view projection from point cloud data.

dcterms:creator: Eriglen Gani
Alda Kika
dcterms:description: A dataset used for comparison in gesture recognition experiments, specifically for recognizing numbers in Albanian sign language from gestures captured by Kinect sensors.

dcterms:creator: Cherdsak Kingkan
Joshua Owoyemi
Koichi Hashimoto
dcterms:description: A dataset used for comparison in gesture recognition experiments, focusing on gesture recognition using point cloud data.
